definition[0]: the act of ending something, or the end of something
example[0]: You may face a reduction or termination of benefits.
definition[1]: a medical operation to end the life of a developing child before it is born
example[1]: No reason was given for the termination of the discussions.
example[2]: Some investors will continue with payments until the plan’s termination in 15 years’ time.
definition[2]: when someone is removed from their job by their employer
example[3]: Some partners were selected for termination.
example[4]: The planned job terminations will affect various locations.
